reviews.text: Great hotel, the garage was limited but we were able to get a space. The room was nice and the shower was great. Breakfast was also very good.

Fantastic!
First, I came here for business trip and was worried that I didn’t get a hotel near city center. Only to find out that local public transportation is just a few minutes walk away.
Second, I visited Cologne with my family and I’m glad they offered us a family suite on short notice.. over the years, I only stay at this hotel if possible.

In general, the staff is great. The receptionists are very friendly, helpful and answer all your questions. The rooms are clean and bright, and will check out the Sauna next time. The breakfast buffet is extraordinary and offers everything you can think of.
First time, every time. Will be coming back!

Booked a one night stay here for easy access to the arena for a concert. It could not have been any easier to walk across the street. The room was really nice. The breakfast was good and in an old swimming pool. Only complaint would be the parking garage. It is tiny. It's probably no more than 30 spaces down there.
If you want to go to lanxess arena this hotel is the best option that you have.

It was one of the few hotels with a family room for 2 adults, 2 children and a baby. The room was very spacious. Breakfast buffet very generous and yummy with a lot of choices.
Only problem for us were the blankets for the king size bed that were definitely not fit for the bed and very short.
You can have parking for your car. 18 euros per day.
In terms of location, you can be in the city centre in around 15/20min walking, so not bad at all.
